metadata.title: CVE-2018-20815 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In QEMU 3.1.0, load_device_tree in device_tree.c calls the deprecated load_image function, which has a buffer overflow risk. Kurtis Miller discovered that a buffer overflow existed in QEMU when loading a device tree blob. A local attacker could use this to execute arbitrary code.

criterions.comment: qemu package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:3.1+dfsg-2ubuntu4').
